name: Kids Love Puzzles Extra
description:
Beautiful puzzle game for kids. If your children love wooden shape puzzle this is perfect game for them.

Over seventy boards with progressing difficulty gives a lot of fun. The game is quite easy to pick up and easy to understand.

Universal app for iPhone/iPod and iPad.
publishers: Eery Lab s.c Grzegorz Studzinski, Adrian Kurek, Michal Okularczyk
